# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(cube LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(cube "")
set_target_properties(cube PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cube")
set_target_properties(cube PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/arm64/release")
target_include_directories(cube SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/include
)
target_compile_options(cube PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cube PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cube PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(cube PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET cube PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(cube PRIVATE
    raylib
    OpenGL
)
target_link_directories(cube PRIVATE
    /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/lib
)
target_sources(cube PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
